DoubleExponentialFilter
DoubleExponentialFilter

Performs filtering on a set of samples using an double exponential filter (where we blend both the derivative and the value)

OneEulerFilter
OneEulerFilter

Performs filtering on a set of samples using the 1-Euro filter.  See https://​cristal​.univ-lille​.fr​/~casiez​/1euro​/ for details.
